self_predictions.prediction_summary: Todd believes he is the one to stop Prudnik and destroy his dreams, indicating confidence in his ability to win.
self_predictions.style_conflict: Todd plans to use his hook and side pressure to counter Prudnik's versatility.

Evgeny Prudnik.strength: Prudnik has incredible hand control and versatility, similar to John Brzenk.
Evgeny Prudnik.previous_match_summary: Prudnik dominated Todd in their 2018 match, but Todd believes he is better prepared now.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Todd believes John's versatility and experience give him the edge, though Ongarbaev could be dangerous if he can force John into awkward positions.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: John's ability to adapt and win from any position will be key.

John Brzenk.strength: John's depth and versatility are unmatched.
John Brzenk.previous_match_summary: John has a history of winning even when outmatched.

Kydyrgali Ongarbaev.strength: Ongarbaev is a well-rounded arm wrestler but may lack the size to overpower John.
Kydyrgali Ongarbaev.previous_match_summary: Ongarbaev has shown quick, snappy top rolls but may struggle against John's experience.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Todd thinks Zurab can win if the match goes into the straps, where his power will be decisive.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Chance's hand control versus Zurab's power in the straps.

Chance Shaw.strength: Chance has good hand control but lacks experience against elite pullers.
Chance Shaw.previous_match_summary: Chance has been improving but still learning at the elite level.

Zurab Tavberidze.strength: Zurab has immense power and can win even without full hand control.
Zurab Tavberidze.previous_match_summary: Zurab's power has been effective in previous matches.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Todd considers Revaz the favorite due to his dominant performance against Michael Todd.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Revaz's power and control versus Derek's potential.

Revaz Lutidze.strength: Revaz is already a world elite opponent with impressive power.
Revaz Lutidze.previous_match_summary: Revaz comfortably beat Michael Todd after returning from a break.

Derek Smith.strength: Derek is trying to reach the level Revaz is already at.
Derek Smith.previous_match_summary: Derek has shown potential but may not be ready for Revaz.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Todd believes the match depends on strategy and could go either way.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Irakli's top roll versus Krasimir's hook.

Irakli Zirakashvili.strength: Irakli has great power and potential but is still rough around the edges.
Irakli Zirakashvili.previous_match_summary: Irakli beat Marcio but lost to Todd recently.

Krasimir Kostadinov.previous_match_summary: Krasimir has faced top competition like Corey and Arif.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Todd thinks Dave's power and endurance will be too much for Morozov.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Dave's unrelenting power versus Morozov's technique.

Artyom Morozov.strength: Morozov is tough and skilled but may lack the power to beat Dave.
Artyom Morozov.previous_match_summary: Morozov has shown promise but faces a big challenge in Dave.

Dave Chaffee.strength: Dave's power from awkward positions is unmatched.
Dave Chaffee.previous_match_summary: Dave has dominated many top pullers with his raw power.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Todd believes Genadi's awareness and power will be too much for Jerry.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Genadi's ability to counter Jerry's style.

Jerry Cadorette.strength: Jerry is strong but may be predictable.
Jerry Cadorette.previous_match_summary: Jerry has been active but faces a tough opponent in Genadi.

Genadi Kvikvinia.strength: Genadi is very strong and well-prepared.
Genadi Kvikvinia.previous_match_summary: Genadi has shown he can handle top competition.

self_predictions.prediction_summary: Prudnik plans to destroy Todd Hutchings, indicating confidence in his ability to win, though he acknowledges it will be a hard match.
self_predictions.style_conflict: Prudnik will try to control the match with his hand and adapt as needed.

Todd Hutchings.strength: Todd's hook and side pressure are very dangerous.
Todd Hutchings.previous_match_summary: Todd has improved since their last match and is now bigger and stronger.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Prudnik thinks John will win if they are in equal shape, but Ongarbaev could win if he is in better shape.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: John's experience and ability to generate pressure from any position.

John Brzenk.strength: John's ability to adapt and win is unparalleled.
John Brzenk.previous_match_summary: John has a history of winning even when outmatched.

Kydyrgali Ongarbaev.strength: Ongarbaev is skilled but may lack the power to overcome John.
Kydyrgali Ongarbaev.previous_match_summary: Ongarbaev has shown quick top rolls but may struggle against John's experience.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Prudnik believes Zurab's size and strength will be decisive.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Zurab's power versus Chance's hand control.

Chance Shaw.strength: Chance has good hand control but may lack the power to stop Zurab.
Chance Shaw.previous_match_summary: Chance has been improving but faces a tough opponent in Zurab.

Zurab Tavberidze.strength: Zurab is very strong and can win even without full hand control.
Zurab Tavberidze.previous_match_summary: Zurab's power has been effective in previous matches.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Prudnik thinks Bozhidar is the favorite in this match.

Bozhidar Simeonov.strength: Bozhidar is a world champion and very strong.
Bozhidar Simeonov.previous_match_summary: Bozhidar has shown he can compete at the highest level.

Davit Samushia.strength: Samushia is skilled but may lack the power to beat Bozhidar.
Davit Samushia.previous_match_summary: Samushia has faced tough competition but may struggle here.
